{"id":383293303,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 8 months","timestamp":1597856908,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"404 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/383293303/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Wildcard Matching","memory":"9.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isMatch(string s, string p) {\n        vector<vector<bool>> dp(p.length() + 1, vector<bool>(s.length() + 1, false)); \n        dp[0][0] = true; \n        \n        for (int i = 1; i < dp.size(); ++i) {\n            if (dp[i - 1][0] && p[i - 1] == '*') {\n                dp[i][0] = true; \n            }\n        }\n        for (int i = 1; i <= p.length(); ++i) {\n            for (int j = 1; j <= s.length(); ++j) {\n                if (p[i - 1] == '*') {\n                    dp[i][j] = dp[i - 1][j] || dp[i][j - 1] || dp[i - 1][j - 1]; \n                } else if (p[i - 1] == '?') {\n                    dp[i][j] = dp[i - 1][j - 1]; \n                } else if (p[i - 1] == s[j - 1]) {\n                    dp[i][j] = dp[i - 1][j - 1]; \n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return dp.back().back();\n                     \n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"wildcard-matching"}
